info.author: Tom Aldcroft
info.description:
The following values are calculated:

    ====  ===================================  ===========
    Name  Value                                Units
    ====  ===================================  ===========
    z     Input redshift 
    H0    Hubble constant
    WR    Omega(radiation)                     
    WK    Omega curvaturve = 1-Omega(total)     
    WM    Omega matter
    WV    Omega vacuum
    DTT   Time from z to now                   Gyr
    age   Age of Universe                      Gyr
    zage  Age of Universe at redshift z        Gyr
    DCMR  Comoving radial distance             Gyr Mpc cm
    VCM   Comoving volume within redshift      Gpc3 
    DA    Angular size distance                Gyr Mpc cm
    DL    Luminosity distance                  Gyr Mpc cm
    PS    Plate scale - distance per arcsec    kpc cm
    ====  ===================================  ===========
info.name: cosmocalc
info.summary: Calculate useful values for a given redshift and cosmology
info.html_description:
The following values are calculated:

Name Value Units
z Input redshift  
H0 Hubble constant  
WR Omega(radiation)  
WK Omega curvaturve = 1-Omega(total)  
WM Omega matter  
WV Omega vacuum  
DTT Time from z to now Gyr
age Age of Universe Gyr
zage Age of Universe at redshift z Gyr
DCMR Comoving radial distance Gyr Mpc cm
VCM Comoving volume within redshift Gpc3
DA Angular size distance Gyr Mpc cm
DL Luminosity distance Gyr Mpc cm
PS Plate scale - distance per arcsec kpc cm
